name: Blogger
short_description:
Pyra Labs is an e-blogging web application that integrates project manager,
contact manager and to do list functionalities.
long_description:
Pyra Labs' first product, also named 'Pyra', was a web application which would
combine a project manager, contact manager, and to-do list. In 1999, while still
in beta, the rudiments of Pyra were repurposed into an in-house tool which
became Blogger.
